name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided
descr:
[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/337000/extras/Jensen-Icarus-Dash.jpg?t=1729006346[/img]
The year is 2029, and mechanically augmented humans have now been deemed outcasts, living a life of complete and total segregation from the rest of society. 

Now an experienced covert operative, Adam Jensen is forced to operate in a world that has grown to despise his kind. Armed with a new arsenal of state-of-the-art weapons and augmentations, he must choose the right approach, along with who to trust, in order to unravel a vast worldwide conspiracy.

Buy Deus Ex: Mankind Divided now and receive the following bonus content FREE:
[list][li]“Desperate Measures” extra in-game mission 
[/li][li]Covert Agent Pack (Intruder Gear, Enforcer Gear and Classic Gear + 1 Praxis Kit + 1000 Credits)[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided
类型: 动作, 角色扮演
开发商: Eidos Montreal, Feral Interactive (Linux), Feral Interactive (Mac)
发行商: Eidos Interactive Corp., Feral Interactive (Linux), Feral Interactive (Mac)
系列: Deus Ex
发行日期: 2016 年 8 月 23 日
review: 最近评测: 多半好评 (124) - 过去 30 天内的 124 篇用户评测中有 79% 为好评。
全部评测: 多半好评 (29,113) - 此游戏的 29,113 篇用户评测中有 76% 为好评。
全部评测: 多半好评 (29,113 篇中的 76%) 发布至今
最近评测: 多半好评 (124 篇中的 79%) 最近
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7.1SP1 or above (64-bit Operating System Required)
处理器: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB)
存储空间: 需要 45 GB 可用空间
推荐配置:
操作系统: Windows 10 64-bit
处理器: Intel Core i7-3770K or AMD FX 8350 Wraith
内存: 16 GB RAM
显卡: AMD Radeon RX 480 - 1920 x 1080 or NVIDIA GTX 970 - 1920 x 1080
存储空间: 需要 55 GB 可用空间
附注事项: 55GB HD space includes DLC
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: macOS 10.13.1
处理器: 3.0GHz Intel Core i5
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: 2GB AMD R9 M290 or better
存储空间: 需要 67 GB 可用空间
附注事项: The game is supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar.
*    All 15” MacBook Pros released since Late 2016
*    All Retina 4K, 21’5” iMacs released since 2017
*    All 27” 5K iMacs released since Late 2014
*    All Mac Pros released since Late 2013
———
The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support.
*   15" Retina Macbook Pro, Mid 2015 with AMD Radeon R9 M370X
———

SteamOS + Linux
最低配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 16.10 64-bit, SteamOS 2.0
处理器: Intel Core i3-4130, AMD FX8350
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: 2GB Nvidia 680 (driver version: 367.57) AMD GPUs are not supported
存储空间: 需要 67 GB 可用空间
附注事项: AMD and Intel Graphics Cards are not supported at the time of release
推荐配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 16.10 64-bit, SteamOS 2.0
处理器: Intel Core i7-3770K
内存: 16 GB RAM
显卡: 6GB Nvidia 1060 (driver version: 367.57)
存储空间: 需要 70 GB 可用空间
附注事项: AMD and Intel Graphics Cards are not supported at the time of release
